original_text: And as they were seeking to kill him, word came to the tribune of the cohort that all Jerusalem was in confusion.
korean_text: 그들이 그를 죽이려 할 때에 온 예루살렘이 요란하다는 소문이 군대의 천부장에게 들리매

sentences.original_text: And as they were seeking to kill him
word came to the tribune of the cohort
that all Jerusalem was in confusion
